body_html: @squallssck would you like to isntall the latest version of tensorflow? if not. you can try this method:http://wiki.jikexueyuan.com/project/tensorflow-zh/get_started/os_setup.html you need just change the version 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 just like this sudo pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.9.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl. I hope it helps .

body: @squallssck  would you like to isntall the latest version of tensorflow? if not. you can try this method:[http://wiki.jikexueyuan.com/project/tensorflow-zh/get_started/os_setup.html](url) you need just change the version 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 just like this  `sudo pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/gpu/tensorflow-0.9.0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl`. I hope it helps .
